content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you in need of plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
I need a plumber, so send someone over. Don’t make me jump through all your hoops.
Thank you for letting us know you need plumbing help. To send the right person, I’ll just need a few details. May I have your name, please?
No, you don’t need my name. Just get someone here. I told you what I want.
I understand this is urgent. In order to dispatch a plumber, I do need your address. Could you please provide your address so we can help as quickly as possible?
You already have my address if you’re any good. Don’t make me repeat myself.
I’m sorry for any frustration. For your privacy and security, I can’t access previous addresses. Please share your address so we can send a plumber right away.
You people are impossible to work with. I’m just trying to get help, but forget it.
I apologize if we made things difficult. If you’d like to continue, please provide your address and I’ll help immediately. If you prefer not to continue, let us know.

reason: Customer requested not to be contacted.
